ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors are grateful to the local communities and hattra for their contributions to the success of this work. The efforts of the RISTOJA 2012 and 2017 team members are also appreciated, as well as the plant taxonomists for identifying the specimens. Finally, the authors wish to thank the Laboratory Data Management NIHRD team, Ministry of Health of the Republic of Indonesia, for providing the subset data.
